title: Hey Meddler
body:
Now you probably don't remember this, but aeons ago, I was celebrating my 2001 ai win with a Rioter. It was you.

You told me at the end to hit you up again for my 3001th. I just checked my counter this instant, and there I am. 3000 victories of mankind against the machines.

So, i'll be putting my bot games on hold until I get news from you. :)
